The eight amazing and incredible qualiti: His heart was inspired as soon as he saw the Buddha
He paid homage to the Buddha with a confident heart
He attained the stainless, immaculate vision of the Dhamma
He undertook the five training rules with celibacy as the fifth
He gave away his teenage wife without getting upset
He shared his family's wealth without reserve with ethical people of good character
He paid homage to a mendicant carefully, not carelessly
He gave up all five lower fetters taught by the Buddha.
